summary: A vim syntax file for the Mercury language.
name: mercury.vim
description: A rather colorful vim syntax file for the Mercury language.
install_details:
Put it in ~/.vim/syntax/.

Then use 
:setf mercury
in vim or set an autocommand

augroup filetype
   au BufRead *.m        set ft=mercury
augroup END

or add something like this to filetype.vim
where it tries to determine the filetype of .m files(grep for matlab).

    if getline(n) =~ '^:-'
      setf mercury
      return
    endif
